text.div:
Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

CodeTypeDescription
should-shallbooleanCodes with this property true must have shall or should appended in the grammar
expressionstringExpression that expresses aggregate codes using the grammar

Concepts

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/CDSSelectionBehavior defines the following codes:

CodeDefinition
at-most-one indicates that the user may choose none or at most one of the suggestions
any indicates that the end user may choose any number of suggestions including none of them and all of them

property.description: Codes with this property true must have shall or should appended in the grammar
Expression that expresses aggregate codes using the grammar

concept.definition: indicates that the user may choose none or at most one of the suggestions
indicates that the end user may choose any number of suggestions including none of them and all of them
